title: Fawad condemns cracker attack in Bahawalnagar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 19 (APP): Federal Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain on Thursday vehemently condemned cracker attack in Bahawalnagar.
In a statement, he said the anti-Pakistan elements wanted to create chaos during Muharram, but such cowardly acts of terrorism cannot dampen our spirits.
He vowed frustrating the nefarious designs of anti-social elements adding,
“We will not allow the nefarious intentions of terrorists to succeed.”
